Sentencas: Chromium (Cr) poisoning is one of the main sources for the performance degradation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) during long-term operation.
Titulo: Machine-learning-assisted prediction of long-term performance degradation on solid oxide fuel cell cathodes induced by chromium poisoning

Sentencas: However, the mechanism of Cr poisoning-induced degradation can be extremely complicated, making accurate prediction of degradation rate very difficult.
Titulo: Machine-learning-assisted prediction of long-term performance degradation on solid oxide fuel cell cathodes induced by chromium poisoning

Sentencas: In this work, we present a new approach enabled by machine learning algorithms to predict the performance degradation of SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Machine-learning-assisted prediction of long-term performance degradation on solid oxide fuel cell cathodes induced by chromium poisoning

Sentencas: Cathode materials based on SrFeO3 with different dopants, i.e., SrFe0.75M0.25O3-delta (M = Co, Fe, Mn, Mo, Nb, and Ni), were chosen as model systems to study the effect of dopant elements on the resistance to Cr poisoning.
Titulo: Machine-learning-assisted prediction of long-term performance degradation on solid oxide fuel cell cathodes induced by chromium poisoning

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) data were collected up to 96 hours for each composition, and were used as input for training the neural network and for validation.
Titulo: Machine-learning-assisted prediction of long-term performance degradation on solid oxide fuel cell cathodes induced by chromium poisoning

Sentencas: The predicted data at 156 hours match the experimental results well, implying the great prediction power of our machine-learning-assisted (MLA) method.
Titulo: Machine-learning-assisted prediction of long-term performance degradation on solid oxide fuel cell cathodes induced by chromium poisoning

Sentencas: Our work demonstrates that the MLA approach can significantly reduce the time needed for extracting the degradation rate of SOFC cathode materials.
Titulo: Machine-learning-assisted prediction of long-term performance degradation on solid oxide fuel cell cathodes induced by chromium poisoning
